rules_text:
You may discard any number of cards. Draw a card for each card you discarded this way.
Exile your graveyard.
flavor_text: [i]“Ryoma...It's true that I still haven't chosen a side. But that's because I believe we can work together for a different cause. We don't have to fight Nohr, and we don't have to fight one another!”[/i]
